descriptions:
["DescriptionBerkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties proudly offers you this lovely and unique 3 bedroom villa in one of the most sought communities of Dubai (Springs).
Why this villa is the better choice in comparison to the others in the same area?
FEATURES:
- Upgraded Interior 
- Upgraded Exterior
- Lovely BIG garden
- Expanded Terrace
- Expanded Entrance 
- Built-in Maid's Room (generously sized)
- Study
The back garden is exceptionally well presented with thoughtful and verdant, varied and colourful planting, a large entertaining terrace with shade and a vibrant lawn. 
SPRINGS:
An established gated community of town houses set amidst scenic waterways and lush landscaping, The Springs is an ideal residential choice for families.
The Springs is an established gated community that has redefined modern living in Dubai. The Springs comprises clusters of townhouses set as distinct precincts, each with dedicated entry points.
Lush green landscaping and scenic lakes are the highlight of the community, which serve as a haven of peace and tranquillity away from the bustle of the city. The homes are designed to the highest standards with spacious living rooms and bedrooms, and an open backyard.
Conveniently located near Dubai Marina, Dubai Internet City, Dubai Media City and Knowledge Village, The Springs is the cherished home for families and professionals.
Residents have access to a wide range of lifestyle amenities including community retail centres, cafes, restaurants, swimming pools, parks and fitness facilities."]

HMS homes are pleasd to introduce this upgraded 3 bedroom in Dorra Bay Tower, Dubai Marina.
Located on a mid floor of the tower, this apartment is complete with three good size bedrooms, fully fitted high end kitchen and good quality wood flooring. The balocny is a good size and has views towards the sea and JBR.
Dubai Marina is an affluent residential neighborhood known for The Beach at JBR, a leisure complex with al fresco dining and sandy stretches to relax on. Smart cafes and pop-up craft markets line waterside promenade Dubai Marina Walk, while Dubai Marina Mall is packed with chain and luxury fashion brands. Upscale yachts cruise through the large man-made marina, where activities range from jet-skiing to skydiving.
Please call Tom Moon on +971501527295 or email tom@hmshomes.com for further information']
